item.title: The Meta Trial Shows the Dangers of Selling Out
item.description: Several founders of hot startups took big payouts and let Mark Zuckerberg gobble up their companies—and came to regret it.

item.title: Apple May Shift to Making US iPhones in India. It Won't Be Easy
item.description: Manufacturers in India would need to double production to meet US iPhone demand—and the shift still wouldn't solve Apple's China problem.

item.title: Aviron Victory Treadmill Review: Get Low
item.description: Entry-level exercisers will love Aviron’s low profile and tons of addicting exercise content.

item.title: 7 Best Shower Water Filters, WIRED Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We tested leading filtered showerheads, from Jolie to Canopy to Hydroviv. The winners were clear.

item.title: Best Open Earbuds, Tested and Reviewed (2025): Bose and More
item.description: These wireless earbuds with an “open” design let you zone out to your music while also keeping you aware of your surroundings.
